Order Date: 

Order from:

Cell:

30x Fingerprint Beans 1kg
8X250g Decaf Espresso Ground

data.snippet: Morning Tegan I hope you are well, Happy Friday, just checking if payment was done please? If so please send POP or advise as to when payment will be made. Thank you, Kind Regards, Emily Lumley From:
data.bodyText:
Morning Tegan

 

I hope you are well,

 

Happy Friday, just checking if payment was done please? If so please send POP or advise as to when payment will be made.

 

Thank you,

 

Kind Regards,

Emily Lumley

Email signature B2A - new

 

 

From: Durban Packaging [mailto:info@durbanpackaging.co.za] 
Sent: 06 September 2023 10:49 AM
To: 'Tegan Botha'
Subject: RE: Order for Lineage Coffee

 

Thank you so much

 

Kind Regards,

Emily Lumley

Email signature B2A - new

 

 

From: Tegan Botha [mailto:office@lineagecoffee.com] 
Sent: 06 September 2023 10:41 AM
To: Durban Packaging
Subject: Re: Order for Lineage Coffee

 

Hi Emily,

 

I will chat with Craig and get back to you.

 

Kind regards

Tegan

 

On Wed, Sep 6, 2023 at 10:32 AM Durban Packaging <info@durbanpackaging.co.za> wrote:

Hi Tegan

 

Thank you for the order, kindly note the account is still in arrears, we can only deliver once the account is up to date.

 

Please can you advise on payment?

 

Kind Regards,

Emily Lumley

Email signature B2A - new

 

 

From: Tegan Botha [mailto:office@lineagecoffee.com] 
Sent: 06 September 2023 10:15 AM
To: Durban Packaging
Subject: Order for Lineage Coffee

 

Good morning,

 

Trust you are well.

 

Please can I place an order for 2x boxes of 500 brown 1kg coffee bags.

 

Thank you

Kind regards

Tegan
